title: Manually fill in missing events and fix inaccurate data from hackalist
body:
The master list of hackathons is pulled from [hackalist](https://hackalist.org). There are some notably missing events and less-than-accurate attributes.

# Missing Data
This should be relatively "easy." We can either:
1. contribute directly to hackalist. This means that we need to add the ability to import from hackalist without starting from scratch.
2. maintain a csv with known missing hackathons and add that to the import process.

**Missing HackMIT 2016**
```
mysql> select title, start_date, host from hackathon where title like 'hackmit%';
+---------+------------+---------------------------------------+
| title   | start_date | host                                  |
+---------+------------+---------------------------------------+
| HACKMIT | 2014-10-04 | Massachusetts Institute of Technology |
| HackMIT | 2015-09-19 | Massachusetts Institute of Technology |
+---------+------------+---------------------------------------+
```

**Missing MHacks 5 (Spring 2015)**
```
mysql> select title, start_date, host from hackathon where title like 'mhacks%';
+----------+------------+------------------------+
| title    | start_date | host                   |
+----------+------------+------------------------+
| MHacks   | 2014-09-05 | University of Michigan |
| MHacks 6 | 2015-09-11 | University of Michigan |
| MHacks 7 | 2016-02-19 | University of Michigan |
| MHacks 8 | 2016-10-07 | University of Michigan |
| MHacks V | 2015-01-16 | University of Michigan |
+----------+------------+------------------------+
```

**Missing HackIllinois 2016 and 2017**
```
mysql> select title, start_date, host from hackathon where title like 'hackillinois%';
+--------------+------------+--------------------------------------------+
| title        | start_date | host                                       |
+--------------+------------+--------------------------------------------+
| HackIllinois | 2015-02-27 | University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign |
+--------------+------------+--------------------------------------------+
```

# Inaccurate Data
Some data is also inaccurate. Options are similar to missing data but will need the ability to update existing entries (check if exists, and "upsert").

**Incorrect `host` for HackGT 2016**
```
mysql> select title, start_date, host from hackathon where title = 'hackgt';
+--------+------------+---------------------------------+
| title  | start_date | host                            |
+--------+------------+---------------------------------+
| HackGT | 2014-09-19 | Georgia Institute of Technology |
| HackGT | 2015-09-25 | Georgia Institute of Technology |
| HackGT | 2016-09-23 | HackGT                          |
+--------+------------+---------------------------------+
```
